snippet: The conservative author’s film paints a forbidding portrait of Hillary Clinton and her fellow Democrats....
abstract: Glenn Kenny reviews Dinesh D’Souza and Bruce Schooley documentary film Hillary's America: The Secret History of the Democratic Party.
lead_paragraph: The conservative author’s film paints a forbidding portrait of Hillary Clinton and her fellow Democrats.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Hillary’s America,’ Dinesh D’Souza Warns of a Plan to ‘Steal’ the Country
